programme.title: Ollie And Friends
programme.sub-title: Wallawoo, I See You!-A Touch Of Cheese
programme.desc: Ollie, Cherry and Sloppy have been invited to the Wallawoo Egg Hunt on the Triangle Aliens' Planet. But the gang gets a bit of a culture shock when Sloppy tries to take home a 'harmless' souvenir. The Red Man goes overboard at the town's Cheese Festival. He makes a wish: that he can eat as much cheese as he wants. His wish is granted... and that's when he realizes that too much of a good thing isn't good at all!(n)

programme.title: David Rocco's Dolce South East Asia
programme.desc: The Vietnam War forced many Vietnamese families to flee Saigon for other parts of the world. Their children are often referred to as Viet-Kieu, people of Vietnamese descent who grew up outside of Vietnam. David explores the incredible food scene of this dynamic city and meets a few Viet-Kiew who have now returned to their ancestral home, looking for new opportunities that are now available in the new Saigon.(n)

programme.title: Tok & Li
programme.sub-title: What if Fazli resorts to become a street salesman selling mops?
programme.desc: Programme is not available for live streaming. Fazli has a good friend, Ah Teck, who earns a living as a street salesman. Ah Teck approaches Fazli asking him to take over his job for a few days as Ah Teck's wife-to-be, Janelle, is seeking for attention lately. Janelle who regards Ah Teck as a big time business man, complains he has been too busy recently. Fazli hesitates but Ah Teck lures him by promising a high commission. Excited, Fazli agrees.With microphone fixed onto him, Fazli enthusiastically sells mops and he manages to attract many buyers. One day Tok goes to the market and bumps into Fazli who is busy selling the mops. Fazli uses various languages and puts up an interesting showmanship. A big crowd begins to form. Tok is proud to see Fazli's success. However, his competitor, Robert, who sells the same stuff, gets jealous of Fazli. He plans to chase Fazli out of the area.
